game.name: Really Fast Rat
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Really Fast Rat is a cute 2D platformer where you play as a Really Fast Rat! Dash into several unique levels and collect some adorable hats!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Really Fast Rat is a cute 2D platformer where you play as a Really Fast Rat! Dash into several unique levels and collect some adorable hats!
